Job_Description:
1. Building and managing infrastructure, running on Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services
2. Install, configure and manage server monitoring tools like Zabbix, Newrelic, Promotheus, etc
3. Install, configure and manage supporting applications like HAProxy, MySQL, Nginx,Jenkins, Consul,  Rundeck or any other necessary apps.
4. Deploy internal Apps with Ansible
5. Implement any custom scripting with Bash or Python if needed
6. Create and provide a detailed documentation for every task
7. Working with software engineers to deploy code regularly
8. Enhancing monitoring tools across our servers
9. Optimizing our server build and code deploy process
10. Implementing auto-scaling techniques
11. Analyze, design and evaluate automation scripts and systems
12. Research new technologies that will improve efficiency and effectiveness
13. Implement highly scalable development environment
Job_Description_Summary: To ensure cross-functional collaboration between software development and IT team (Ops team) run smoothly

Job_Description:
• Plans, designs and implements an overall risk management process for the organization;
  • Conducts risk assessment, which involves analyzing risks as well as identifying, describing and estimate the risks affecting the organization;
  • Prepares risk evaluation , which involves comparing estimated risks with criteria established by the organization such as costs, legal requirements and environmental factors and evaluating the organization’s ‘risk appetite’, i.e. the level of risk they are prepared to accept;
  • Prepares risk reporting in an appropriate way for different audiences, for example, to the Executive Committee or the Board of Trustees, so they understand the most significant risks, to business heads to ensure they are aware of risks relevant to their parts of the business and to individuals to understand their accountability for individual risks;
  • Handles corporate governance involving external risk reporting to stakeholders;
Job_Description_Summary:
The Risk and Compliance Manager works with the organization to advise Management of any
potential risks that may affect the reputation, safety, security, financial sustainability and
existence of the organization. He is expected to provide a better assessment of the risk
management policies and protocols in order to come up with policies and recommendations to
avoid threats, reduce or transfer risks and/or mitigate the effects of those which are essentially
unavoidable. The responsibility includes managing the risks associated to the organization,
employees, customers, reputation, assets and interests of stakeholders. As such he will be
working in a variety of sections and specialize in a number of areas including:

Job_Description:
Responsibilities
• Manage Salesforce developer team
• Help us to interact with our customers better with Salesforce
• Analyse and review business, functional, and technical requirements -Build the application based
• on technical specifications
• Configuration of the modules
• Customization using code (Apex, lightning)
• Reviewing code quality
• Plan and execute internal Unit testing and integration testing
• Prepare test data, plan and conduct basic unit or module testing
• Perform the deployment of the application
• Empower our Customer Care and sales team by developing best in class features in Salesforce
• Improve Salesforce usage across the company
• Extract important data as reports to guide the business
• Ability to be dynamic and flexible in light of changing circumstances and adapt strategies and
• activities accordingly.
• Self-starter with high level of personal organization, attention to detail, assertiveness, tenacity
• and integrity.


Requirements
• Requires 5 years of experience in IT
• Strong oral and written communication skills
• Certified Salesforce Developer
• Have built interactive UIs on Salesforce, in either classic or lightning mode. Knowledge of the
Lightning framework is a plus
• Experience with creating dashboards, handling migrations, new development
• Apart from being able to write Apex classes, triggers, etc,
• The candidate should be well versed with tools such as process builder, data loader, Salesforce
DX and able to make changes to the data model
• Proven experience with technologies integrate to Salesforce including: HTML/CSS, Java, jQuery,
JavaScript, SQL
Job_Description_Summary: To develop software solution to support tiket.com to be the most customer centric OTA

Job_Description:
1. Responsible for supervising and directing the finance functions, including general ledger, accounts payable and receivable, check processing, IRA processing, exception items, fixed asset, and cost accounting
2. Prepares periodic reports, reviews and reconciles data, and
participates in the development of specialized financial data
3. Oversees and prepares entries and adjustments to records, files, and statements
4. Assists with financial and variance analyses, board packet information, and budget preparation
5. Ensures that acceptable production and quality standards are maintained
6. Ensures that finance functions are completed in accordance with established policies and standards and related governmental
requirements.
7. Directs, trains, supervises, and assists in appraising finance personnel.
Job_Description_Summary: Manages and supervises the work of finance staff

Job_Description:
1. Collect, analyzes, and shares data to help business teams drive improvement in key business metrics, customer experience, and business results.
2. Works with the BI Analyst during implementation, gathering additional information when needed and keeping the business informed.
3. Implements data structures using best practices in data modeling, processes and technologies.
4. Perform data conversions, imports, and exports of data within and between internal and external software systems.
5. Explores the data and discovers patterns, meaningful relationships, anomalies and trends.
6. Performs programming analysis for a wide range of requests using data in differen
7. Implements tools and frameworks for automating report generations, identification of data-quality issues, and data governance.
8. Enhances the performance of business intelligence tools by defining data to filter and indexes.
9. Designs and delivers end-users training and training materials. Trains users to transform data into action-oriented information and to use that information correctly.
10. Create planning and monitoring team performance. Develop, manage, and evaluate team to achieve expected result. 
11. Gives direct and constructive feedback to other team member
12. Shares technical context and direction for less experienced team member
Job_Description_Summary: Responsible for the full life cycle development, implementation, production support, and performance turning of the Enterprise Data Warehouse, Data Mart, and Business Intelligence Reporting environments, and support the integration of those system with other applications. Design and implement reporting and analytical solutions to help business team drive improvement in key business metrics, customer experience and business results.
